summary: Simple Sword based on the Va-307 Zombie Slayer Sword from Valiant Armory
descriptionHtml:
Simple tactical sword that is lightweight and easy to use 

Base stat of 10 
Speed is 1.3 
Critical damage +12
Critical Chance +15%

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/22787489-1473255001.jpg[/img]

What the base damage lacks is made up for with speed and critical damage 

the idea is that as a player who uses a light sword, you swing faster and have more accurate hits

Sword comes in two versions and play styles 

Sword
-Just Sword
-Sword and Scabbard - Scabbard is polished wood

Dagger
-same as above but uses dagger animations

Recommend using racemenu and xpsme to adjust where the weapon is on body and where you draw it from - back hip side etc

xpsme http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?

racemenu http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?


please check out my other mod 

Khajiit Jera Combat Robes 
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78382/?

this is a stand alone version for the sword in the above mod
if you download my above mod, you do not need this stand alone mod


the edge of the blade is brightened to enhance 3rd person play which is what i normally do, may look alittle to bright in 1st person
author: PocMouse
